entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
